title: FS/FT Harry Davis SGC30 great colors !!! SOLD
author: Joshchisox08

posts.post_title: FS/FT Harry Davis SGC30 great colors !!! SOLD
posts.post_content:
Up for sale or trade is a beautiful Harry Davis. This looks to be well undergraded to me. Could have easily got a Very Good. Asking $SOLD. 

I'm also open to trades for other cards that are graded in that range. I'd almost prefer a trade rather to selling it. I really like this Davis but have since got a Soverign Davis so the Pied has to go to a new home.
